Senior Logistics Officer Job at Sayed Farms Limited




        
    

        
        Sayed Farms Limited is specialized in poultry sector covering all its major aspects, and also in the distribution of frozen food in the Nigerian Market. Our line of frozen products has expanded to include the finest quality of chicken, potatoes, cheese, vegetables, seafood, and ice cream products in the market. We are currently hiring an experienced and objective-driven candidates to fill the below positions:

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Senior Logistics Officer

Job Reference: SLO2025028
Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Responsibilities

	Oversee the daily operations of logistics/fleet management, ensuring timely receipt, storage, and dispatch of goods.
	Coordination with truck Drivers and organizing the receiving process for raw materials delivered by suppliers, including prioritizing arrivals.
	Customer Truck Management for instance to maintain an efficient truck schedule to ensure that first come, first dispatched.
	Liaise with governmental agencies on matters relating to company’s fleet
	Develop and implement strategies for inventory control, warehouse layout optimization, and stock accuracy.
	Manage inbound and outbound logistics, including transportation, route planning, and delivery schedules.
	Ensure compliance with safety, regulatory, and quality standards across all logistics and warehouse activities.
	Monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) to track operational efficiency and identify areas for improvement.
	Negotiate and manage contracts with third-party logistics providers (3PLs) to achieve cost efficiency.
	Handle escalations related to logistics challenges and resolve operational issues promptly.
	Prepare regular reports on inventory, logistics performance, and cost analysis for senior management review.
	Carry out other duties that may be assigned to you from time to time.


Requirements


	Bachelor's Degree in Logistics, Supply Chain Management, or a related field is preferred
	Minimum of 5 - 7 years of experience in a similar role within the FMCG sector preferable from frozen foods companies
	Proven track record in warehouse management, logistics, and supply chain operations.
	Strong analytical skills with the ability to optimize processes and drive cost savings.
	Proficiency in Fleet Management Systems (FMS) and Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) tools.
	Certification in Supply Chain Management (e.g., APICS CPIM or CSCP) will be an added advantage.
	Excellent leadership, communication, and problem-solving skills.
	Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and manage multiple priorities effectively.


Key skills and Competencies:


	Have outstanding interpersonal and communication skills, both verbal and written.
	Have strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
	Be able to pay attention to details and accuracy.
	Have excellent time management and prioritization skills.
	Be able to thrive in a collaborative, fast-paced environment.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their Application Letters and CV along with passport photographs to: jobs@sayedfarms.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

HAM / Admin Officer Job at Dangote Group




        
    

        
        Dangote Group is one of Nigeria’s most diversified business conglomerates with a hard – earned reputation for excellent business practices and products’ quality with its operational headquarters in the bustling metropolis of Lagos, Nigeria in West Africa.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: HAM / Admin Officer

Job Location: Ibese Plant, Ogun

Role Overview
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are looking for a skilled Human Resources Officer to act as the primary intermediary between plant employees and management.
	The ideal candidate will have substantial experience in employee relations within a large industrial or plant setting and possess strong HR expertise to address employee concerns and foster positive workplace dynamics.


Key Responsibilities


	Serve as a liaison between plant employees and management to resolve issues.
	Manage employee relations, ensuring effective communication and resolution of grievances.
	Support HR functions including onboarding, performance reviews, and employee engagement.
	Assist in developing and implementing HR strategies aligned with operational goals.
	Facilitate communication and collaboration between different departments and teams.
	Monitor and ensure compliance with labor laws and plant policies.
	Work closely with management to address workforce planning and development needs.


Qualifications & Other Requirements


	BSc/HND in Business Administration, or a related field.
	3+ years of experience in employee relations and HR functions, particularly in a large industrial setting.
	Strong knowledge of labor laws and regulations.
	Exceptional interpersonal and communication skills.
	Proven ability to manage conflict and resolve employee grievances.
	Adaptable and able to handle the demands of a large plant operation.

  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Head of Sales",
  "description": "KOKO TV is a fast growing music production company, based at London&rsquo;s iconic music venue, KOKO. Founded in 2010, we have quickly established ourselves as a major player in the youth music market.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Head of Sales

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos

Role Description


	The Head of Sales would lead strategic and operational business initiatives aimed at customer acquisition, revenue growth, profitability and market share.&nbsp;


Responsibilities


	Achieve growth and hit sales targets by successfully managing the business unit
	Eloquently articulating, collaborating and implement agency strategic business plan
	Own budgeting, objectives setting, coaching and performance monitoring of sales team
	Client lead and support on portfolio of clients
	Present sales, revenue and expenses reports and forecasts to the management team
	Identify emerging markets and market shifts while being fully aware of new products and competition status
	Taking on an influential role in supporting new business initiatives and leveraging client relationships in the development of business growth
	Must be able to travel as needed and open to new places, new faces and new ideas.


Qualifications

	Degree (ideally Postgraduate) in Communications, Business and/or Marketing, however this is not essential.
